uvi.description:
usb: fix various gadget panics on 10gbps cabling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.273 by commit fd24be23abf3e94260be0f00bb42c7e91d495f87. For more details please see the references link.
